Enhance your Bleeping Computer Experience!

Bleeping Computer Xtension is a compilation of features packed into a single, ultimate suite. From Thread Changes, Forum Changes, Private Message Changes, even Global Changes, BCX does it all!


Changelog:
2018-5-21: Beta 0.0.0.2 Release Includes:
+ EasyCite
+ Online Sorting
+ Hide Alert Banner
+ Activity Label on Profiles
+ PM From Post (WIP)

2018-1-18: Beta 0.0.0.1 Release Includes:
+ Alpha release

Detailed Recent Changes can be found here: https://github.com/xadamxk/BCX/wiki/Changelog
